name: What goes up (StuffandStuff)
description:
What goes up is a puzzle platform combo. solve puzzles and fight crimson bosses in a starry world. (P.S this is my first ever game made with a complex game engine, and I'm11 years old at the time of finishing the game)

controls are as follows:

  • arrow keys to move left and right
  • spacebar to jump
  • up to reverse gravity if the player is green
  • L to launch item
  • R or Backspace to restart level
  • Esc/P to pause the game
  • M to toggle music
  • + to speed up time
  • - to slow down time
  • 0 to reset time

please note that this games time scale is NOT meant to be tampered with and we suggest not messing with it on your first play through.

credits:

art: percy michell

music: percy michell

level design: percy michell, Felix Andrews

code: percy michell, Felix Andrews

made with Godot game engine
